channel.title: Wordsort
channel.description: Find a bunch of roughly synonymous things, and then sort them. I do this sometimes. It should be fairly obvious to you which word is more intense than the next-- if you can't pick between two words, then choose one and move on to the next tier. I'll start! 1. Humid 1. Damp 1. Moist 1. Wet 1. Soaked 1. Soggy 1. Saturated (Degrees of wetness.)

item.title: Wordsort
item.dc:creator: Tiki
item.description:
1. Mist
  2. Drip
  3. Dribble
  4. Slosh
  5. Splash
  6. Pour
  7. Inundate
  8. Flood
  9. Surge
  10. Engulf
    (Degrees of watering your plant.)

Read full topic

item.title: Wordsort
item.dc:creator: Tiki
item.description:
Find a bunch of roughly synonymous things, and then sort them. I do this sometimes. It should be fairly obvious to you which word is more intense than the next-- if you can’t pick between two words, then choose one and move on to the next tier. I’ll start!

  1. Humid
  2. Damp
  3. Moist
  4. Wet
  5. Soaked
  6. Soggy
  7. Saturated
    (Degrees of wetness.)

Read full topic
